articles.author: Lauran Neergaard
articles.title: US starts grappling with 'travesty' of untreated hepatitis C - Waco Tribune-Herald
articles.description: WASHINGTON (AP) — Too many Americans are missing out on a cure for hepatitis C, and a study underway in a hard-hit corner of Kentucky is exploring a simple way to start changing that. The key: On-the-spot diagnosis to replace today's multiple-step testing.
articles.content:

articles.author: Aya Elamroussi
articles.title: Polar air and a powerful winter storm put millions under winter alerts this holiday week - CNN
articles.description: For millions of Americans across a large swath of the country, the holiday week is beginning with unrelenting below-freezing temperatures made even more miserable by heavy snow expected Tuesday and Wednesday in several central and northwestern states.
